Sentencas: One of the candidates for metallic interconnects of solid oxide fuel cells is ferritic stainless steel, Crofer 22 APU.
Titulo: Change in the Microstructure of Ferritic Stainless Steel with Surface Roughness and the Number of Thermal Cycles

Sentencas: Ferritic stainless steel Crofer 22 APU specimens with different surface roughness were prepared by grinding with SiC powder papers of various grits and then thermally cycled in air.
Titulo: Change in the Microstructure of Ferritic Stainless Steel with Surface Roughness and the Number of Thermal Cycles

Sentencas: Variation in the microstructure of the samples having different roughness with thermal cycling was investigated.
Titulo: Change in the Microstructure of Ferritic Stainless Steel with Surface Roughness and the Number of Thermal Cycles

Sentencas: Polished Crofer 22 APU specimens after three and five thermal cycles had relatively flat oxide layers with thicknesses of about 13.8 and 17.9 mu m, respectively.
Titulo: Change in the Microstructure of Ferritic Stainless Steel with Surface Roughness and the Number of Thermal Cycles

Sentencas: Micrographs of a trench made by milling with FIB (focused ion beam) for a Crofer 22 APU specimen ground with grit 80 SiC powder paper after 8 thermal cycles (total oxygen exposure time of 200 h at 1073 K), captured by ESB (energy selective back-scattering) and SE2 (type II secondary electrons), showed that the surface of the sample was very coarse and its oxide layer was undulated.
Titulo: Change in the Microstructure of Ferritic Stainless Steel with Surface Roughness and the Number of Thermal Cycles

Sentencas: In the oxide layer, the phase of the sublayer was Cr2O3, and that of the top layer was (Cr, Mn())3O(4) spinel.
Titulo: Change in the Microstructure of Ferritic Stainless Steel with Surface Roughness and the Number of Thermal Cycles

Sentencas: The surface of the sample ground with grit 80 SiC powder paper was very rough after 60 thermal cycles (total oxygen exposure time of 1500 h at 1073 K).
Titulo: Change in the Microstructure of Ferritic Stainless Steel with Surface Roughness and the Number of Thermal Cycles

Sentencas: The polished Crofer 22 APU is a better applicant to an interconnect of SOFC than those with rougher surfaces.
Titulo: Change in the Microstructure of Ferritic Stainless Steel with Surface Roughness and the Number of Thermal Cycles
